item.title: Trump, Putin meeting set for next week in Alaska
item.description: Trump made no mention of whether Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky would be attending.

item.title: Texas attorney general sues to remove 13 absent Democrats from office
item.description: During a brief session Friday, state House Speaker Dustin Burrows (R) announced the chamber did not have enough members present to conduct business.

item.title: Trump says he’ll meet Putin on Aug. 15, as foreign policy takes center stage
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s second term and the Republican-led Congress.
